mainContent.title: Studying is creating a new world
mainContent.description: The UNAPEC Fidel Méndez Núñez Library offers a wide variety of books, magazines, newspapers, and digital media, which can be used for research, learning, and entertainment for students and faculty.

advantages.title: Advantages of using the APEC library
list: Access to a wide variety of resources, such as online catalogs.
Access to all the e-books in the virtual library.
Offers comfortable and quiet spaces for studying.
Allows you to reserve carrels or multimedia rooms for group study.
Allows you to reserve books for a specific period of time.
Provides a conducive environment for developing reading and writing skills.
Offers advice on internal library procedures.
They offer training on how to access the virtual library.

page.title: The War Of The Worlds - Library UNAPEC

bookDetails.title: The War Of The Worlds

bookCover.src: Imagen de la portada de La Guerra de los Mundos
bookCover.alt: Portada del libro La Guerra de los Mundos

bookDetails.description: The plot takes place in late 19th-century England and narrates the invasion of Earth by Martian aliens, who arrive in metal cylinders and begin attacking humanity with advanced war machines, such as giant tripods. The protagonist is an unnamed narrator living in London who witnesses the horrors of the Martian invasion. As the story progresses, the narrator fights for his survival and tries to understand the motive behind the brutal invasion.

university.name: APEC University
university.address: Av. Máximo Gómez #72, Santo Domingo, Dominican Republic

page.title: The City and the Dogs - UNAPEC Library

bookDetails.title: The City and the Dogs

bookCover.alt: Portada del libro La ciudad y los perros

bookDetails.description: The plot centers on four cadets: the Jaguar, the Poet, the Slave, and the Boa, who represent different facets of Peruvian society and are trapped in an oppressive environment where hierarchy and brutality are the norm. The novel addresses themes such as masculinity, loyalty, betrayal, and the search for identity in a context of social pressure and violence..

university.name: Universidad APEC
university.address: Av. Máximo Gómez #72, Santo Domingo, República Dominicana

page.title: How to write a thesis in tourism: methodological outline - UNAPEC Library

bookDetails.title: How to Write a Thesis in Tourism: Methodological Framework

bookCover.alt: Cover of the book How to Write a Thesis in Tourism: Methodological Framework

bookDetails.description: This practical guide provides steps for developing a thesis in Tourism aimed at university students and professionals who wish to conduct research in the field of tourism. It offers a solid methodological approach and applied tools to carry out effective and meaningful research in this area.

page.title: Frequently Asked Questions - Fidel Méndez Núñez Library

questions.question: How many times can I renew a book?
questions.answer: The loan can be renewed up to three (3) times.

bookDetails.title: The War of the Worlds

bookCover.src: Cover image of The War of the Worlds
bookCover.alt: Cover of the book The War of the Worlds

bookDetails.description: The plot is set in late 19th-century England and tells the story of Earth's invasion by Martian aliens, who arrive in metal cylinders and begin attacking humanity with advanced war machines, like giant tripods. The protagonist is an unnamed narrator who lives in London and witnesses the horrors of the Martian invasion. As the story progresses, the narrator struggles for survival and tries to understand the reason behind the brutal invasion.

trainingList.title: Functionalities of the Virtual Library
trainingList.description: The library is a fundamental resource offering a wide range of functionalities for accessing information and knowledge. Its main features include: resource collection, material lending, in-room consultations, internet access, digital services such as e-books, online databases, online courses, printed resources, programs, and activities.
trainingList.speaker: Elizabeth Vargas

video.alt: Video on Functionalities of the Virtual Library

trainingList.title: Bibliographic Manager
trainingList.description: This is a tool or software designed to help researchers, students, and academics organize, manage, and cite bibliographic references used in their academic work, such as theses, essays, scientific articles, and other documents.
trainingList.speaker: Carlos Matos

notification.title: Notification
notification.details: You will receive a notification in your email when it starts.

platforms.name: EBSCOHOST
platforms.description: eBook Academic Collection contains over 137,840 electronic book titles from prestigious academic publishers, covering all subjects and fields of knowledge. It is available with unlimited concurrent user access from any location.

platforms.name: Elibro
platforms.description: eLibro.net is currently the most comprehensive academic platform for electronic content in Spanish. It has over 100,000 titles across all areas of knowledge. The most important collection is Cátedra, covering all areas of knowledge.
